H2.text: What European country has 227 inhabited islands. Norway

A4.text: Norway has about 400,000 lakes and 239,057 registered islands

A5.text: There are 108 settlements that have town/city status in Norway

A6.text: Greece features a vast number of islands—between 1,200 and 6,000, depending on the definition, 227 of which are inhabited.
